data.title: Never Disappoints
data.text:
This is a friendly local restaurant in a historic building. Located on the second floor with a beautiful staircase or elevator delivering you to a tastefully decorated open dining area to one side and a full bar and dining on another.
We come here often. The menu does not change but there are daily specials. We especially enjoy the Provaleta appetizer and the fresh pop over bread. We ordered salmon and short ribs this evening which were both delicious. I had the gouda mashed potatoes which are incredibly rich and flavorful. The price is upper range for the area but well worth the price.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Place has awesome food. Service was a little slow but they were busy. Lobster stuffed mushrooms are great.

data.title: Great place for lunch
data.text: The food is very tasty and they have limited menu but there is a variety of great choices. The dinner menu is expanded and you will find some additional selections on that. The wait staff is friendly and eager to please.

data.title: Soup salad dieting
data.text:
Fried goat cheese salad was excellent !!!!!!
Classic French onion soup was also very good  with plenty of gooey melted cheese 
Appetizer was calamari.   Best in Decatur 
Goose island  cold bottle good

Ice tea was not good. Tasted 2-3 days old  but waitress assured me it was just brewed   And by the way she just ignored it  did not try to make it right !!

data.title: Great Establishment. Eat here.
data.text: Had cocktails and dinner with a couple clients. Everything is top notch. Get the Hot Rock appetizer. First time I've ever seen that. Incredible. I will be shopping for a hot rock to try at my house. The Hanger steak was perfect.

data.title: Favorite restaurant for us
data.text:
Food presentation is beautiful and taste delicious!
Salmon well prepared, Short ribs, are just two of our favorites there.
Wait Staff is well trained and efficient!

data.title: Nice Downtown Decatur Restaurant
data.text: Taproot is located on the second floor along Decatur's Merchant Street.  Access is by stairs or an elevator.  It's a nice unique restaurant serving different takes on standard items that you'd get somewhere else.  Prices are average for the level of dining.  The service has been nice when I've been there, and the atmosphere is casual.  It has a main dining room, a bar area with eating areas, and a back room for events.  Taproot is a nice place to go eat for a nice evening downtown.

data.title: Pleasant dinner
data.text: Nice location on historic Merchant Street.  The meal was very good, as was the dessert.  Our waitress was attentive and kept our glasses filled.  A great place for a pleasant dinner!

data.title: Great experience
data.text: We had fabulous cocktails, appetizers, dinner, and even dessert.  It was ALL delicious!  The service was very good. We have been to Taproot a few times before and have always been happy with the food and service.

data.title: Christmas shopping break
data.text: Black Friday is the day my daughter, daughter-in-law, and I do some "shopping" -- it's really more just wandering downtown Decatur and its quaint shops.  We always find a place to eat downtown and Taproot was a relatively new restaurant. The menu is very diverse and unique, including MANY items my vegetarian daughter-in-law was thrilled with! Staff seemed a little harried, but then, remember it was the day after Thanksgiving and it was packed!!!  To me, that is a great sign of a fantastic venue!!!

data.title: A large group had a great time with delicious food
data.text: 9 couples met for dinner in this historic building in downtown Decatur. The service, drinks and food were all excellent. We had a private room. Reservations are a great idea.

data.title: nice place for lunch
data.text: In town visiting mom and brother and looking for a nice place for lunch and discovered Taproot was open for lunch.  We had lobster tacos, reuben sandwich, chicken gyro,southern fried chicken wrap, farmers market salad w/chicken and pita pizza for my niece.  Everyone thought the food was delicious and the atmosphere was great.  There is an elevator which was great for my mother otherwise we wouldn't have been able to dine here.

data.title: Pleasantly surprised
data.text: We moved our daughter here to Decatur and knew nothing about the restaurants. My daughter found this one on line and wanted to try it.  We had the Tasting Board for and appetizer, perfect for the three of us. We had three different entrees, the Signature Short ribs were incredible, Asiago Pasta, though a little dry, excellent and the Herbed Brick Chicken, moist and tender. I had the roasted root veggies, carrots, parsnips and onions. I could have these for a meal. The prices seemed a little high for this area but we would definitely go again when we visit!

data.title: Overpriced
data.text: Food was good but so incredibly over priced. Definitely expected to be "wowed" more for 2 people and an $80bill. Service was lacking as well. Had to ask on several occasions just for our waters to be refilled.

data.title: Wonderl experience
data.text: Restaurant and bar. Great scene. Plenty of  room for our party of 11. Great food selection. Quaint little part of the historic downtown.

data.title: Really?
data.text:
Truffle steak and manhatten excellent. Justin did an awesome job. Nope- service was not slow.
Brownie also awesome. 
Short ribs/ chicken/crusted grouper topour list. Very happy with our choice.

data.title: Slow
data.text: This place is over priced for the service and food. 2 1/2 hrs. It took a long time to get our food. When we were finally served, our food was almost cold. The baked potatoes had that rewarmed in the microwave taste!! One person in our group had the fish! Wow. Needed a magnifying glass to see it!! Way over priced!! Don't drink mixed drinks!! $10.00 for a drink that you pay $6.00 for everywhere else!! I will say the pork chop is very good!!  Salads are extra and very small!!!

data.title: Never a bad meal
data.text: My husband and I have eaten at Taproot multiple times, and I can honestly say we've never had a bad meal. They have great food and great service.

data.title: Great in Every Way!
data.text: Awesome dinner! We were in town from Chicago and looking for a place with local charm and a tasty menu. We found it in Taproot! Excellent service, tons of unique and delicious options, and top-notch drinks too. We will return if we're ever in the area again!

data.title: So good!
data.text: The hot rock appetizer was fun and delicious.  All of us were very happy with the food we ordered.  The atmosphere is lovely, I can't wait to go back!
